GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
net: qrtr: start MHI channel after endpoit creation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit a1a75f78a2937567946b1b756f82462874b5ca20, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit a2e2cc0dbb1121dfa875da1c04f3dff966fec162. For more details please see the references link.
